title: THE LONG HISTORY OF COURT ORDERED SCHOOL DESEGREGATION
description1: The year is 1955 and it has unanimously been decided that, "separate educational facilities are inherently unequal."
description2: All states have been ordered to desegregate public schools "with all deliberate speed".
intro: Yet, over 60 years later, many schools around the country that have been ordered to desegregate have yet to comply with the court orders.
